text: @GrandpaSnarky @NikkiHaley are you crazy? Raised America to the biggest covid-19 country in the world. I think that’s reason enough to hate him.  What results? Proof please and not your usual boot licking of hitler wannabe. OMG. What wrong with these republicans??🤦🏻‍♀️🤦🏻‍♀️🤦🏻‍♀️
